What is there in the menu.annotation: We have Pizza, Pasta, Chinese and burger food items in our menu.

What type of pizzas do you have?.annotation: We have margharita and farm house

What is there in chinese items?.annotation: We have noodles and momos in our Chinese menu.

What is the price/cost of Pizza?.annotation: Which type of pizza you would like to have?

What is the cost/price of margharita.annotation: Cost of margharita is ruppees 300/- only.

What is the cost/price of farm house.annotation: Cost of farm-house is ruppees 500/- only.

What is the size of this pizza?.annotation: We have medium sized pizza's only. Each having 6 slices.

what all do you have in your menu.annotation: We have Pizza, Pasta, Chinese and burger food items in our menu.

I want to have a pizza..annotation: We have two types of pizza. margharita and farm house. which one you want?

Okay bring one margharita for me..annotation: Ordered! You order is booked. Do you like to order anything else?

i love you.annotation: I love all my customers. Thanks for the love.

Tell me the types of pasta you have?.annotation: We have white sauce pasta and red sauce pasta for you.

What is the price for red sauce pasta?.annotation: Cost of red sauce pasta is ruppees 300 only.

what is the cost of white sauce pasta.annotation: Cost of white sauce pasta is ruppees 500 only.

What are other things you have apart fro.annotation: we have pizza, chines food and burger items in our menu.
